item.title: Update the vCenter inventory in vCAC manually
item.description: When creating a new template in vCenter and want to use the new created template in a blueprint, the blueprint will not list the template because the vCenter inventory isnâ€™t updated in vCAC. By default vCAC will update the vCenter inventory once a day. To manually update the vCenter inventory in vCAC 6.x use the following steps: Login the vCloud Automation Center console Select the Infrastructure tab Select Compute Resources Select the Compute Resource you want to update.
